message: From the first moment we met, I knew there was something special about you. Your kindness, your laughter, and the way you see the world have changed my life in ways I never imagined. Every day with you is an adventure, and I'm so grateful to be on this journey by your side.

memories.title: The Day We Met
memories.description: At the bookstore, of all places. You were looking for a book I loved, and I just had to recommend it to you. We talked for hours that day.

memories.title: Our First Trip Together
memories.description: That weekend at the beach was magical. We stayed up all night talking by the fire, and I knew then that I was falling in love with you.

memories.title: New Year's Eve
memories.description: Welcoming the new year together, just the two of us. I'll never forget how you looked in the candlelight, laughing at my terrible jokes.

memories.title: Adopting Luna
memories.description: The day we brought our little fur baby home. You were so patient with her, and seeing you care for her made me love you even more.

finalNote: You are my favorite hello and my hardest goodbye. Every moment with you is a treasure, and I can't wait to see what the future holds for us. No matter what comes our way, I know we'll face it together.
